notesStmt.note: Compound document includes cover letter and transaction statement

bibl.title: Cover letter and transaction statement ending June 30, 1906, Lincoln Land Company

msIdentifier.repository: McCracken Research Library, MS407 Bronson Rumsey Collection

div1.note:
Office of Lincoln Land Company
Rooms 33-36, 1241 O Street
Lincoln, Neb.
C. H. Morrill, President.
A. B. Minor, Sec'y and Treasurer.
Quotations of Prices Are Subject to Change without Notice.
div1.p: Herewith statement of account of the Cody property held jointly by this Company and yourself as Trustee representing certain other interests, showing net balance for the one-half represented by you $5424.79, for which amount you will find herewith New York draft payable to your order.
Please receipt and return the accompanying voucher, and oblige,
Statement of Business transacted at Cody, Wyoming, by the Lincoln Land Company, with respect to the one-half interest of Bronson Rumsey, Trustee, for the six months ending June 30th, 1906.
div1.note: [View image of page one of six-month financial statement ending June 30, 1906, for full display.]
[View image of page two of six-month financial statement ending June 30, 1906, for full display.]
[View image of page three of six-month financial statement ending June 30, 1906, for full display.]
div1.ab:
Bronson Rumsey, Trustee, Statement
6 Months ending June 30-06.
$5.424.79
